title: Home Page displays random motivational quotes
description: Verify that the home page loads and displays a random motivational quote each time the page is visited or refreshed.

steps.description: Navigate to the home page
Check that a motivational quote is displayed
Refresh the home page
Validate that a quote (possibly different) is displayed again

title: Global Header renders responsively on different devices
description: Ensure the global header displays and navigates correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewport sizes.

steps.description: Load the application in desktop viewport
Verify global header is visible, elements aligned, and navigation links clickable
Resize viewport to tablet size
Confirm header adjusts layout appropriately without clipping or overflow
Resize viewport to mobile size
Check header menu collapses to hamburger menu and navigation works correctly when expanded

title: User Management page shows loading indicator while fetching users
description: Validate that while user data is being fetched via API on the User Management page, a loading indicator is visible to the user.

steps.description: Navigate to User Management page
Confirm loading indicator is shown while user data is loading
After loading completes, loading indicator disappears

title: User Management page displays 'No users found' message when no users exist
description: Ensure that if the API returns zero users, a clear message 'No users found' is displayed instead of an empty list.

steps.description: Mock API to return empty user list
Navigate to User Management page
Verify that the message 'No users found' is displayed prominently

title: Create new user with valid inputs successfully
description: Test creating a new user by entering valid email and name, submitting the form, and verifying that the user is added and displayed in the list.

steps.description: Navigate to User Management page
Input valid email in the email field
Input valid name in the name field
Click the 'Create User' button
Validate API is called with correct payload
Confirm new user appears in the user list
Check form inputs are reset after successful creation

title: Create new user fails with invalid email format
description: Verify that entering an invalid email format prevents form submission and shows a validation error.

steps.description: Navigate to User Management page
Enter invalid email format in the email field (e.g. 'useratexample')
Enter valid name in the name field
Click the 'Create User' button
Verify submission is blocked and validation error message for email is displayed
Confirm no API call is made

title: API error handling during user creation
description: Simulate an API error when creating a user and verify that an appropriate error message is shown to the user.

steps.description: Mock API to return an error during user creation
Fill in valid email and name
Click the 'Create User' button
Verify error message is displayed indicating creation failure
Confirm form remains editable for retry

title: Delete user successfully
description: Test that clicking delete on a user triggers API call and on success removes the user from the list with updated state.

steps.description: Navigate to User Management page with existing users
Click delete button for a specific user
Verify API delete request is sent with correct user id
Confirm user is removed from user list upon successful deletion

title: Delete user API error handling
description: Simulate an API error during user deletion and verify error message is shown with no change to user list.

steps.description: Mock delete API to return error
Attempt to delete a user
Verify that an error message is displayed for delete failure
Confirm user remains visible in the list

title: Intrinsic Value Calculator accurate calculation
description: Validate the intrinsic value calculator correctly computes the intrinsic value based on Graham's formula for various inputs.

steps.description: Navigate to Intrinsic Value Calculator page
Input valid stock data required by Graham's formula (EPS, growth rate, etc.)
Submit form to calculate intrinsic value
Verify output matches expected intrinsic value calculated externally using Graham's formula

title: Intrinsic Value Calculator handles invalid inputs
description: Ensure that invalid or missing inputs in the intrinsic value calculator form trigger validation errors and prevent calculation.

steps.description: Navigate to Intrinsic Value Calculator page
Input invalid values such as negative EPS or missing required fields
Attempt to submit the calculation form
Confirm validation error messages are displayed for invalid input fields
Verify calculation is blocked until valid data is provided

title: Application UI theme consistency across light and dark modes
description: Validate that the combined Tailwind CSS and Material UI styling results in a visually consistent interface across light and dark themes on all major pages.

steps.description: Switch application to light theme
Check visual consistency on Home, Users, Intrinsic Value Calculator, and Header components
Switch application to dark theme
Verify no visual glitches, color clashes, or readability issues in dark mode across same pages and components
